import Big from"big.js";export default function operate(numberOne,numberTwo,operation){var one=Big(numberOne||"0");var two=Big(numberTwo||(operation==="รท"||operation==='x'?"1":"0"));//If dividing or multiplying, then 1 maintains current value in cases of null
if(operation==="+"){return one.plus(two).toString();}if(operation==="-"){return one.minus(two).toString();}if(operation==="x"){return one.times(two).toString();}if(operation==="รท"){if(two==="0"){alert("Divide by 0 error");return"0";}else{return one.div(two).toString();}}throw Error("Unknown operation '".concat(operation,"'"));}
